channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump complains Epstein files are a distraction as flight logs reveal deeper ties and ‘unfounded and false’ claims emerge
item.description: The biggest Epstein files information dump yet leaves questions unanswered.

item.title: DHS Finalizes Controversial Immigration Rule On H-1B Lottery
item.description: The Trump administration has finalized a controversial immigration rule that will significantly change the H-1B selection process.

item.title: Americans enjoy one refuge from inflation: The cheapest gas prices in years
item.description: Gas below $3 is a welcome relief to many Americans.

item.title: Where you can shop for your last-minute Christmas needs
item.description: Need last-minute holiday essentials? Find out which major retailers like Target have modified hours on Christmas Eve and will close for the holiday.

item.title: Republican lawmaker and notable Trump critic Ben Sasse announces stage 4 cancer: ‘Now marching to the beat of a faster drummer’
item.description: “I’m not going down without a fight," said the Ivy League-educated father of three.

item.title: JPMorgan to allow crypto trading for institutional clients in latest embrace of the sector
item.description: CEO Jamie Dimon appears to have reversed course from once equating Bitcoin with a “pet rock.”

item.description: Student loan borrowers see the end of leniency during Biden's term.

item.description: Samsung's Harman, looking to expand its automotive electronics capabilities announced an agreement to acquire a unit of ZF Group.
